channel.title: Gustav Janssons devlog
channel.description: This blog is a try to me keep motivates and a way to see my progress on my current projects. Let’s see how it goes!

item.title: Week 26
item.description: This week I worked on cleaning up git commits and using better commit messages.

item.title: Week 25
item.description: This week I continued on cleaning up euphoria

item.title: Week 24
item.description: This week I continued on refactoring and code health for euphoria. Still got a few errors and warnings to take care of :)

item.title: Week 23
item.description: This week I converted the color palettes to constexpr and focused on fixing code style issues
This week I replaced travis with github actions for euphoria. In the process I also updated imgui, replaced freetype with stb.truetype and continued cleaning up the source

item.title: Week 21
item.description: This week I finally finished the refactoring and started the process of moving from travis and appveyor to github actions for the ci.

item.title: Week 18
item.description: This week I continued refactoring euph to the new code style. The core library is almost complete now :)

item.title: Week 17
item.description: This week I added both a brand new minesweeper clone and a old four-in-a-row in 3d clone that I made in 07. There is still some minor work to be done on both, but there are 2 game examples for fyro/tred now, hurray.

item.title: Week 16
item.description: This week I started refactoring euphoria from CamelCase to snake_case. I also started work on batching sprite rendering for tred

item.title: Week 15
item.description: This week I i removed the last of javascript references merged the lua branch of euphoria into master. Still a few places to clean up but I can move forward now with a better scriping engine. I am actually tempted to put all my efforts into a vertical slice of the engine so we’ll see in a week if I took action or continued cleaning up the code.

item.title: Week 14
item.description: This week I realized that lua perhaps could be a good candidate for scripting language, so I updated the lua fork to the lastest master.

item.title: Week 13
item.description: This week I started updating my script-test since I have recently found myself in need of a better scripting language. I also took the plunge and started making a small textbased game in typescript and react.

item.title: Week 12
item.description: This week I started on clang-tidying euphoria. I probably should complete the tred before gettting back to euphoria…

item.title: Week 11
item.description: This week I mostly been watching netflix but I did started to clean up my bookscript

item.title: Week 10
item.description: This week I continued to work on the book script. It’s actually getting close to completion now. A few smaller things left but the only major is only generating a ebook file from the source
